Original:
亞昕福朋喜來登精釀吧讓我喜出望外，氣氛不錯，可以喝咖啡也有輕食跟主食，今天點了買一送一的IP A生啤酒，苦中回甘，好喝！
我們點了叻沙海鮮麵，湯頭超喜歡，微辣香氣十足，裡面放了足夠份量的貝類、蝦子和小章魚，真的很過癮。
還有冰淇淋格子鬆餅、煙燻肉起司拼盤，端上來真的是擺盤好看，令人食欲大增。甜點用心好吃，起司也很棒，唯獨煙燻肉感覺有點味道，可能不合我們的胃口吧！
總之，是個美好的夜晚😍

餐廳很有氣氛，燈光很適合喝酒，但吃飯就顯得有點暗了，熱愛明亮餐廳的我剛開始還真不習慣。

短時間內，第二次回訪。點了星巴克焦糖瑪奇朵和店長特調伯爵冰奶茶，真的很用心！綿密的奶泡，跟星巴克本店不太一樣，但仍舊香氣十足。
今天店經理聽我說之前冰淇淋格子鬆餅的冰淇淋太少，竟然還多招待了一球😍（對不起，我不是奧客，是真的覺得美中不足）好感動！

2023/10/5
今天點了很多人「必點的牛肉麵」，看起來很不錯，但開吃之後有點失望😢
實在太鹹了，濃郁和鹹是兩回事⋯⋯我加了半杯水才吃下去。牛肉和牛筋滷得很入味，但有點膩，可能只是不太合我口味吧。
EN:
Yaxin Fupeng is happy to make me happy. The atmosphere is good. You can drink coffee and have light food and staple food. Today, I ordered to buy one free IP A raw beer.
We ordered Laksa seafood noodles. The soup was very liked, and the slightly spicy aroma was full of spicy aroma. There were enough weight shellfish, shrimp and small octopus, which was really enjoyable.
There are also ice cream plaid pine cakes and smoky meat cheese platter. The ending is really good -looking, which makes the appetite greatly increase.The dessert is delicious, and the cheese is also great. The smoky meat feels a bit flavorful. It may not match our appetite!
In short, it's a beautiful night 😍

The restaurant is very atmospheric. The lighting is very suitable for drinking, but eating is a bit dark. I love the bright restaurant at first.

In a short time, the second visit.I ordered Starbucks caramel Macchido and the manager of the Store, the Earl Course Ice Milk Tea, really attentive!The dense milk bubbles are not the same as the Starbucks store, but it is still full of aroma.
Today, the store manager listened to me that I had little ice cream in ice cream grid muffins before, and even entertaining a ball (sorry, I am not a guest, I really feel that the beauty is not enough)!

2023/10/5
Today, I ordered a lot of people "must order beef noodles". It looks very good, but after eating
It's too salty, rich and salty are two different things. I added half a glass of water to eat.The beef and beef tendon are very delicious, but it is a bit greasy. It may just not fit my taste.

Original:
這家店在喜來登的一樓
餐點口味還OK 沒有很驚艷
但是有幾款生啤酒可以選擇 這也是我來這家店的原因
生啤酒的品質不錯 味道也有自己的特色
如果想喝一杯的可以來 很不錯
吃飯就算了😂
EN:
This shop is on the first floor of Xilaiden
The taste of the meal is still OK is not amazing
But there are a few raw beer to choose from. This is why I came to this shop
The quality of raw beer has good quality and has its own characteristics
If you want to drink a cup, you can come very well
Even if you eat

Original:
唯一的一顆星是給有特色的啤酒
其他整體來說是不好的用餐體驗

服務（收10%服務費）：
1. 看我們是年輕人，服務員在吧台內理都沒理，我們站在門口看完菜單兩遍了，走進去才會招呼。之後有幾位年長客人站在門口，卻高聲的打招呼呢
2. 餐點用完擺了40分鐘後才將餐盤收走
3. 其他桌上一組客人走了好久，餐盤也不收，人卻在旁邊用電腦，殘局擺著當裝飾嗎

環境：
1. 沙發坐墊都陷下去了，給人很老舊的感覺
2. 音樂播放有夠雜亂，竟然是兩個音樂混在一起放，只能用吵來形容
3. 雖然知道晚上想營造酒吧的氣氛，但是燈也關太暗了吧，桌子都是黑的，還怎麼享用餐點？至少來盞聚光燈也好一百倍

餐點：
1. 食物方面(豬肋排)，以這個價格來說，只能說普普
2. 啤酒倒是很有特色，香氣很夠，後勁也很強
3. 咖啡是星巴克的沒錯，但沒有拉花，奶泡是機械擠出來的，所以鬆鬆散散的
EN:
The only star is for special beer
Other overall is a bad dining experience

Service (10%service fee):
1. Seeing that we are young people, the waiters are unreasonable in the bar. We stood at the door and watched the menu twice, and we greeted them before entering.After that, several older guests stood at the door, but greeted loudly
2. After the meal was finished for 40 minutes, the dining plate was taken away
3. A group of guests on the other tables have gone for a long time, and the dishes are not collected, but people use computers next to them.

environment:
1. The cushions of the sofa are all sinking, giving people a very old feeling
2. Music playback is messy enough, but it turned out to be mixed together in two music, and can only be described by noise
3. Although I know the atmosphere of the bar wants to create a bar at night, the lights are too dark. The tables are all dark. How can I enjoy meals?At least it is a hundred times better to come to the light light

Meal:
1. Food (pork ribs), in this price, it can only be said
2. Beer is very distinctive, the aroma is enough, and the stamina is very strong
3. Coffee is right from Starbucks, but there is no flowers. The milk foam is crowded out mechanically, so the loose is scattered.

Original: 食物很一般，氣氛很一般，服務也不錯，但令人失望的是，我們的服務員在用完IPA 和Pomelo 選項來滿足我們的2 for 1 後，除了基本的金色啤酒之外，沒有努力提供像樣的啤酒優惠。這個人真的很不靈活，不需要太多就能讓顧客滿意。如果您想要一般的體驗，那就是您該去的地方。
